content: *this is a fun and decorative way to keep your cat and yourself entertained lionbrand com * lion brand pattern # 80063ad skill level easy #620 wool-ease 1 ball each of 3 colors violet zinnia avocado crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers jingle bell fiberfill stuffing special stitch decrease single_crochet decrease hanger and squiggle are worked in row ball is worked in rounds some construction required to finish
